content.rendered:
Directed by Bugs Bhargava Krishna

Written by Bugs Bhargava Krishna

Cast Arjun Rampal(Siddharth Jaisingh). Manav Kaul(Veer Singh ‘Ranjit’ ‘Charu Raina’). Anand Tiwari(Amit Kumar). Rajit Kapoor(Judge Kishore Bhushan (as Rajit Kapur)). Madhoo(Shobha Bhusan). Samreen Kaur(Charu Raina). Sukesh Anand(Harpal Phera). Rishabh Bhardwaj(Assistant Lawyer). Deepak Chaddha(Dada Shah). Shaunak Chandorkar(Kevin Dsouza). Mansi Deshmukh(Maya Kawal (as Mansee Deshmukh)). Sameer Dharmadhikari(DCP Sunil Sachdeva). Pratibha Goregaonkar(Matron). Neha Hinge(Malthi Kumar). Rohit Kumar(Snake saver). Yogendra Kumeria(Nikhil tiwari). Ashutosh Priyadarshi(Jail Rasoiya). Rushad Rana(Yashpal Sharma). Vikram Sahu(Dr. Bharti). Poonam Shende(Assistant Lawyer). Shivkumar Subramaniam(Dr. Nandi). Tarul Swami(Alok Awasthi)

Language Hindi

Producers Jahanara Bhargava. Dhirajj Vinodd Kapoor. Seema Mohapatra. Pradeep Uppoor. Saurabh M. Vanzara.

Production Drishyam Films
